en.codex: The Imperator Vandal has been customized by the Tenno with a blue-green metallic finish and Lotus branding on the barrel.
en.description: The Imperator Vandal is the Vandal form of the Imperator heavy machine gun for the Archwing flight system, offered as a reward for attaining 15 (10 for PS4/XB1) Battle Points in the Operation Eyes of Blight event.

ru.description: Император Вандал раскрашен Тэнно в сине-зелёный цвет, с изображением Лотос на стволе.
